domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Downton Abbey
entity.description: This historical drama follows the lives of the Crawley family and their servants in the family's Edwardian country house. The programme begins with the 1912 sinking of the Titanic, which leaves Downton Abbey's future in jeopardy, as Lord Grantham's presumptive heir -- his cousin James -- and his son, Patrick, die aboard the ship, leaving him without a male offspring to take over the throne upon his death. As a result, Lord Grantham must search for a new heir. As the programme progresses through the decade, other historical events happen leading up to Lord Grantham declaring in 1914 that Britain is at war with Germany, marking the beginning of World War I, which becomes a major plot on the programme.

urls.title: Programme & Registration | Flood & Coast
urls.description: Telford International Centre, UK The 2021 Flood and Coast conference and expo will take place on Hopin, a virtual event platform designed to feel like an in-person event. Each day will be fully packed with interactive sessions, live exhibition booths and networking opportunities,‚ÄØwith‚ÄØthe audience‚ÄØaddressing some of the most important issues in FCERM. Delegates will interact with speakers through the live Q & A sessions, meet with exhibitors in our live expo hall, and connect with new people through

text: Join me next week as I host the next #FloodandCoast digital session on 9 Dec discussing the #ClimateEmergency and featuring speakers @CvNieuwenhuizen, @SaleemulHuq, @DeniseBower1310 and @annietrev. Book tickets here: https://t.co/diXMjPkfo5. @EnvAgency https://t.co/mmB6dDXCmf
